resources.string: Error compressing the database. Check the device\'s storage is not mounted and that you have enough disk space, then relaunch.
ERROR: Drodiwall could not be launched. Is it installed on your device?
Wifi interface must be turned off! Please relaunch application.
ERROR. Could not export log. Make sure USB storage is turned off.
ERROR. Logcat export was interrupted! Please, try again.
Droidwall must be disabled to send the results. Select the option to disable the Firewall, and press BACK to return and try to Upload Results again.
Droidwall must be enabled to start the service. Select the option to enable the Firewall, and press BACK to return and try to Start again.
Timeout disabling wlan interface, try doing it from settings and restart
